RawLine: TNPC_31076203,請一次給我{color=#cc0004}汾酒{/color}、{color=#cc0004}十全大補酒{/color}、{color=#cc0004}金華紅{/color}、{color=#cc0004}妃笑酒{/color}這四種酒。,请一次给我{color=#cc0004}汾酒{/color}、{color=#cc0004}十全大补酒{/color}、{color=#cc0004}金华红{/color}、{color=#cc0004}妃笑酒{/color}这四种酒。

Items.r: 請一次給我{color=#cc0004}汾酒{/color}、{color=#cc0004}十全大補酒{/color}、{color=#cc0004}金華紅{/color}、{color=#cc0004}妃笑酒{/color}這四種酒。

Items.mt: Please give me four kinds of wine at once: Fenjiu, Ten Perfect Tonic Wine, Jinhua Red and Feixiao Wine.
